website_summaries.verdict: The LG Vortex is a wonderful entry-level Android smartphone for Verizon Wireless, as long as you know its limitations.
pros: The LG Vortex has a slim and simple design with a good touch-screen display
A, Wi-Fi with 3G Mobile Hotspot capabilities, a 3.2-megapixel camera, and stereo Bluetooth, and it ships with Android 2.2
cons: The LG Vortex isn't as fast as higher-end smartphones, and the camera has neither LED flash nor HD video capture
The browser doesn't support Flash video
It comes with Bing search and Bing maps instead of Google's own services
The price is not as competitive as other comparable handsets
You can't uninstall preloaded apps and services

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for what it is which is one of the cheaper smartphones that you can get with no contract. I got this when I lost my phone and didn't have an upgrade available. It seems to struggle technically when trying to run some apps (turn by turn directions just did not work for example) and frequently run low on storage space because many apps can't be moved to the SD card, but it gets the basics like phone, text and email done if you need it. I was glad to trade it in for a higher end phone when my contract was up for renewal/upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ren

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I can't use this phone. I can't find a place to put my card(T-Mobile)

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone because my 8 yr old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone because my 8 yr old daughter needed a replacement phone after breaking hers it had to b a 3G phone to work with her service provider which is only a talk/text plan the phone I received DID NOT take a sims card which is excactly what I needed only gave it 4 stars because the phone was suppose to b new but someone had already set it up and downloaded apps on it

customer_reviews.title: Going back
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this phone and I am already sending it back. It arrived late, but the seller did refund me the $6.95 I paid for expedited shipping. My plan was to use it for work so the sound had to be good. I found a way to test it and yeah, the sound was horrible! Not distorted, just very low. The volume was turned all the way up. Don't buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good entry level Android phone
customer_reviews.text: In general this is a great phone for the price. My only complaints are: 1) The keyboard isn't quite as easy to use as I expected, although the Swype technology helps 2) As you're typing a text message, you can only see 2 lines of your message at a time, so you have to scroll up and down to proof-read, which is a little annoying 3) The battery life seems pretty short - occasionally less than a day with normal usage. I may try changing some app settings and whatnot to see if I can improve that. But overall, I would recommend it if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Keeler

customer_reviews.title: but I actually fell in love with this phone after using it for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was getting a used phone, and it was only temporary, but I actually fell in love with this phone after using it for a couple hours. Nice and simple, yet has important features we use in the day & age. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good But......
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this phone for my husband to use on a solo bicycling trip from Michigan. However, the instruction manual is far too detailed. In addition, the charger failed one week into the trip. This trip did not go through major cities where a new charger could have been purchased. If it hadn't been that at one hotel he stayed at, a guest had left a charger which the desk person gave to him he wouldn't have been able to make any calls. The phone is a little difficult to use. He could check e-mail and send texts.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johns

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is relunctantly tip toeing into what ever century we are in. She is slowly picking up on the workings of an android smart phone. I think she's having fun at it but hasn't had it very long. It fits her hand fine, the battery seems to last longer than my Droid X between charges. I hope time doesn't have any bad news in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R. Slone

customer_reviews.title: ... out dated and don't work but the phone is great for making calls and texting
customer_reviews.text: Most of the features on the phone are out dated and don't work but the phone is great for making calls and texting. There is no flash for the camera but overall it's an OK phone to use as a substitute until I can get my other phone replaced in the meantime.

The only complaint is the phone freezes or shuts down, but that's most likely because I have run too many applications at once, and well because it is STILL an LG.

product_meta.title: LG Vortex Android Smartphone Black Verizon PagePlus
product_meta.description: The Android based LG Vortex smartphone is similar to the Optimus S and is notable for including a mobile hotspot feature that lets nearby Wi-Fi devices share the phone's Internet connection. Other features are par for Android phones, including 3G high-speed, turn-by-turn GPS navigation, 3-megapixel camera, video capture, WiFi, capacitive touchscreen, Web browser, and microSD slot for additional storage. The LG Vortex also comes equipped with an email client, MMS and SMS text messaging, music player, Bluetooth compatibility, and support for multiple languages including Spanish. This Android device also offers access to thousands of apps, games, movies, and music available on the Google Play Store.
feature_bullets: This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.5 out of 5 stars74 ratings2.5 out of 5 stars
